website_summaries.verdict: Well worth the money if you get a good unit, but our research indicates that a lot of these get returned. That's frustrating.
pros: Steams, can be used as humidifier and steams towels
Comes with handy set of tools to eliminate blackheads, acne, etc
Great price, and the unit is portable

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT !!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: HOLD UP WAIT A MIN!!!! I USED A STEAMER B4 N I LITERALLY HAD TO PUT MY FACE MAD CLOSE ‘ I WAS SCARED TO ORDER AT FIRST BUT I WATCHED A YOUTUBE AND BABYYYYYYYYYY!!! THIS STEAM SMOKE HEAVY & IT BLOW OUT BABY!!! IT EVEN CAME WITH A FACE WASH I DIDNT KNOW IT WAS (I HAVE ONE ALREADY TOO LOL NOW I DONT HAVE TO BUY ANOTHER) THIS SO GREAT I LITERALLY OPEN THE BOX A HOUR AGO AND USED AND N HAD TO PUT A REVIEW RIGHT AWAY! CAME QUICK LESS THAN A WEEK!! GOT IN THE SHOWER & MY FACE FEELS SO F’ING SMOOVE & SOFT!!! LIKE I DNT THINK YALL UNDERSTAND!! BUY IT NOW!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product & amazing customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought this steamer about a year ago and I LOVE IT! I suffer from blackheads all over my face but especially worry about the ones I get around my lips. I wasn’t able to get them out without hurting the sensitive skin there until I got this steamer to help get those lil nasties out. But almost better than the product are the people behind the scenes. I made a stupid decision and accidentally melted the water reservoir - when I emailed the company not only did they respond within a couple of hours, they replaces the part for free! I recommend 10000%
customer_reviews.author: Emily Victor

customer_reviews.title: Great form factor, operates for 30 min straight before refill, GREAT product!
customer_reviews.text: Steam gets pretty hot! Which is great! Just adjust your distance from the orifice. I use this every night before i go to bed before i put on my potions and lotions. Also GREAT to have in the cubicle if you have congestion, or use as a humidifier for dry air in the winter. I haven't used the tools it comes with though. Another great feature is the duration it lasts for - about 30 minutes straight and the overall form factor is quite compact. I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Magnus

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Steamer!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great steamer! It really opens up the pores. I love how it has a nice strong steam, just make sure you keep your face at a safe distance. Most people do not like to wash their face before steaming, but I personally like to wash my face before I steam. I steam my face and when I am done, then I use a blackhead extractor to get all of the dirt out of my pores, apply a good mask, then serum, then a moisturizer or oil. I know it sounds like a lot to do but it is worth it! My skin tone looks brighter and is very soft. I highly recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So relaxing!
customer_reviews.text: Facial steaming with this nanosteamer is soooo relaxing and I love that it also has the humidifier and small towel warmer functions. When I'm not facial steaming, I'm often using it as a humidifier in the room because it helps reduce my allergies. I try to steam 2-3x a week, followed by cupping therapy and the two work hand in hand so well to make my face look super plump and healthy! Once I figure out how to extract blackheads safely with the tools provided with this steamer, I'll be golden and never need to go to an esthetician's office.
customer_reviews.author: Babadook

customer_reviews.title: good customer service
customer_reviews.text: the first steamer I received didn't work very good, but after emailing customer support they got back to me same day and were able to ship a new steamer out to my house which I received in the same week. the new steamer they sent me works perfectly, have used it more than 10 times now and still produces a nice even flow of steam each time. would recommend this steamer to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: brooklyn

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: This steamer came out of the box perfect! So far I love how clean my face feels after a steam session in the morning. It is especially refreshing after a workout! Haven’t tried the towel heater yet but I can’t wait! I just ordered the amazon towels for it. Once I have tried it I will update my review.
customer_reviews.author: ChelseaH

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful steamer won’t regret getting it
customer_reviews.text: I really like this steamer don’t know much about them but this was definitely a great buy. The steamer warms up really fast the steam is really good, the towel function I have yet to try but I’m pretty confident it’s great as well and the humidifier feature is great as well I like it. This steamer gets my pores open and it hydrates my skin it’s really wonderful I use it 2-3 times a week along with a lore suction device they work beautifully together! I would totally recommend you get this steamer!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: High quality product for a knockoff price!
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with the quality of this steamer. I thought it was cheap because of the price but it's really well built. The part that interlocks locks in firmly, the knob has good response and the steamer itself works extremely well.. the free 5 piece tool kit included doesn't feel free.. and what i mean by that is that there is weight to the metal. You can tell they will stant the test of time and wont bend/break on you.
customer_reviews.author: Inqiyad

customer_reviews.title: So for so good
customer_reviews.text: I've only used the Steamer Twice and I love it. It's good to know I get an extended warranty for free for a year, that says a lot from the company. For a moment I thought there was some sort of a cover for the part from where the steam comes out for when one's not using it to avoid dust to get in, but there isn't one. It doesn't take away from the so far positive experience I've had. I'll update this review after a few months to let people know how things are going.
customer_reviews.author: Edward G.

customer_reviews.title: So good!!
customer_reviews.text: So good!!! Use it two days, my skin feel clean and soft. going to use it day and night. And it is easy to use. I recommend unlock the head after use, let the air dry the reminding water. use vinegar clean it at least once a week.
customer_reviews.author: LadyB

customer_reviews.title: Priced right, perfect sized facial steamer.
customer_reviews.text: Reasonably priced. Like really. This little machine is amazing. I have been shopping around for a facial steamer for awhile now and came across this. Decided to give it a try and haven’t regretted it. It works well and as described by the seller. It’s also a decent size. I’ve came across some really expensive models that were big, ugly and overpriced. Pretty happy with this, and now I can forever look like I’m 29 instead of 40.
customer_reviews.author: ehhh

customer_reviews.title: Great product, would recommend to a friend and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: I love how well it works. When I drape a towel over head, it works fantastically. I like the height design. The other steamers I have used in the past were too low. I also love the feature of a warm towel which is innovative and useful. The negative aspects are that you cannot use essential oils in this unit which is a big part of my daily regiment. It also doesn’t steam for 30 minutes as proclaimed.
customer_reviews.author: Mili Naugle

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic face steamer
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic face steamer! - it started working immediately - sometimes the water tanks on these things are too big and I feel like a lot of water is wasted waiting for it to warm up / you won't use all of it in 1 session - this however is the perfect size! I look forward to trying out the towel warmer too. I would absolutely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: LRF

customer_reviews.title: Helps with cold and flu symptoms
customer_reviews.text: This product works very well! My girlfriend and I had fairly miserable bouts of the flu this past winter. The steam from this product really helped to open up our sinuses and make our coughing less severe during the later stages of the sickness.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Works better and gets warmer than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I use this product at least once a week! Works better and gets warmer than I expected, and I've definitely noticed my skin get shinier, smoother, and have clearer pores as a result! You really can't beat the price for a product that works this well, and I love the little extractor tool kit it comes with! Would purchase again, even as a gift!
customer_reviews.author: rachet10

customer_reviews.title: I love this! It was the best purchase I made ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It was the best purchase I made last year. I have used it about 3 times for giving myself a facial and also used it as a vaporizer while I had a cold. It's amazing. The tools are also a great plus, but don't use them too much unless you have experience! You could hurt yourself or leave marks on your face.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Nogueira

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: The towel steamer works! I pre wet a little my towel and worked well. Now the towel will loose the heat quickly but that is just physics. The steamer works great i did put a towel around me and was sweating in less than 3 min. It gets hot so watch out dont burn your face. The tools are an ok extra but if you drop the price and take off the tools i would prefer it that way. Overall great. I do not received any discounts or benefits.
customer_reviews.author: Mgallo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for first month but half way through steaming it spits hot water out.....not cool.
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what its suppose to at first. Then it started sputtering scalding hot water at me. Very disapointed because it says window to return was closed on Oct 13th.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!! Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this 2 days ago and I was so exited to get it today and use it tonight before I went to bed! I'm seriously so obsessed with this facial steamer and so happy I got to use it tonight. After I steamed my face for about 10 mins, I used a face mask (origins charcoal mask) and OHHHH MY GOSHHHH my face was so soft afterwards. I can't wait to use this steamer again... which will probably be tomorrow night. Great product!!! It also heated up within a minute or so! Very impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... week for 15 minutes and my pores looks the best they ever have
customer_reviews.text: I use this face steamer twice a week for 15 minutes and my pores looks the best they ever have. They're smaller and I haven't had any acne. So much more comfortable than steaming over a pot on the stove! Well worth the investment!
customer_reviews.author: Stfortn - male born in 1988

customer_reviews.title: I've Got Sssssteamed Heat!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this item. The cloth barrel inside is perfect (caution, it gets really hot to take out of the barrel - use tongs). The steam lasted just the right amount of time. I love it. I'd recommend to others
customer_reviews.author: Libby H.

customer_reviews.title: Really great product. Hope to get a lot of use ...
customer_reviews.text: Really great product. Hope to get a lot of use out of this one. My only criticism is the size: it would be nice if the steamer was more compact so that you could place it on a table while sitting down. But in order to properly distance it from your face, you really need to stand in front of it. Still, really relaxing and really seems to maximize the benefits of following with a mask.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Pickell

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work well for cystic acne
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! I've only been using it for three days but I think its already helping my cystic acne. I like to steam for a bit, extract, steam again, and while still steaming, wipe my face with something antibacterial like orange blossom water. Then, while staying close to the steamer to keep my pores open, I apply a homemade mix of argan oil, rose hip and calendula essential oils. My face is clearing right up!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Poulson

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the purchase. Feel like I lost money
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the purchase. My wife was excited to get this product after seeing some other makeup artists using different brands of this same product. In comparison this doesn't work as well. The three settings have no significant difference. And the facial steam setting is more like the lightest steam that you have to even kneel down to see if it's working. I'd recommend maybe a different brand if you are looking for a real experience. I'm doing more reasearch now.
customer_reviews.author: kevin fontleroy

customer_reviews.title: Plastic parts broken.
customer_reviews.text: This item works fine but I bought in September and now in December the valve on the water tank is completely broken. I’ve used this maybe a handful of times and when NOT in use I’ve put it directly back in the box for safe storage. I would like to be able to contact the customer service and aee if they could send a replacement water tank because barely 3 months of use and it being broken is not a good sign of quality.
customer_reviews.author: Christine M.

customer_reviews.title: For this price, the product works great!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for about 3 weeks or so and first week I used it almost daily and the next two weeks about 2 sometimes 3 times. It still works perfectly and does the job! I’m very careful about the tools because I have acne and break out always; so I leave that up to the esthetician, but she says it’s so good for us to steam our face weekly! For good skin and youthful appearance
customer_reviews.author: Ella

customer_reviews.title: Love this steamer
customer_reviews.text: I swear my skin has had dramatic improvement since I started using this steamer. I only use it 3-4 times a week, but I definitely notice that the white bumps I was starting to see around my mouth have begun to either get much smaller or they have gone away completely. I particularly love the feature that allows you to steam a washcloth - that is my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: AZTransplant

customer_reviews.title: Not a good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Steam barely comes out and when it does, it sprays constantly in new directions I find myself always having to move my face to find the steam. Really not impressed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: LeeAnn

customer_reviews.title: Bought new, came used ☹️
customer_reviews.text: Had to return obviously, because the steamer came with water tank leaking water and the machine used before. Will order again because I still want to try out this steamer due to so many good reviews and overall rating. Will update this review once the new item arrives.
customer_reviews.author: Tabish Khan

customer_reviews.title: Leakage problem
customer_reviews.text: Water started leaking from the base after about 1-2 weeks of use. I didn’t notice it right away and the water ruined my desk. Also, strong smell of plastic when initially got it, somewhat dissipates over time.
customer_reviews.author: VanillaRooibos

customer_reviews.title: Bought Broke Returned, Bought Again, Broke Again
customer_reviews.text: I love facial steamers, but this one has broken on me twice. I returned it the first time and rebought it with the credit because I know that every once in a while faulty items happen. But this just seems to be an overall problem with the build of the steamer...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked for a short time.
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed this for about 2 weeks. Now the tank is not feeding the water correctly and the steam stops shortly after it gets going. I can shake the unit to get more water to go in but that's annoying. Based on my experience, I do not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jane L. Dough

customer_reviews.title: Lovely machine ❤️
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this thing all of 24 hours and already used it 3 times. Probably not great for my skin but it feels so good and it’s incredibly relaxing. I’m very impressed with the thickness of the steam as well. I didn’t expect it to be as intense as it is.
customer_reviews.author: Francisca Maria Kidd

customer_reviews.title: Works but smells of chemical plastic
customer_reviews.text: Steams really well. It works. The only thing that bothers me is the steam smells like chemical plastic. Make me worry about breathing it since its not BPA free.
customer_reviews.author: Ibuytoomuch

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Nice flow of steam. The water reservoir depletes pretty fast depending on how long you use it but it is easy to refill. Comes with a nice face blemish took kit which can come in handy. Product is attractive and sits firmly on surface. Doesn't get too hot to touch.
customer_reviews.author: ame1210

customer_reviews.title: watch out for cracked cap on water filter
customer_reviews.text: I loved this when I first got it but the cap on the water filter chipped and broke only a few months after having it which was disappointing. Maybe if the quality was a little better it would have lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth your money :(
customer_reviews.text: After using it for a couple of day it stared smelling horrible, I then took it apart to clean it. It has silver particles coming out from inside with brown smelling water. I attempted to clean it several times but the water continue to smell horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Yary-Hija de Dios

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: I don't really review any of the products I buy but I was so disappointed at this one. i used it only once and the plastic around the water reservoir part broke!!
customer_reviews.author: M. A.

customer_reviews.title: It was working fine. I loved the product but yesterday suddenly i ...
customer_reviews.text: its been 6 months since I brought this product. It was working fine. I loved the product but yesterday suddenly i got a loud sound and burnt smell while steaming and it didn't work there after. I felt really bad and it was dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: Reddy

customer_reviews.title: Order Issue
customer_reviews.text: I received my package opened and without the 5 Piece Stainless Steel Skin Kit. I've never had an issue as far as delivery and would like the rest of my order sent to me ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Ihekwoaba

customer_reviews.title: 1st time. No steam. Doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a while ago and just took it out of the package to use for the first time. I followed the prep instructions, turned it on and waited 5minutes but there was no steam. What a waste. If you’re looking for a quality steamer I suggest you shop elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: marley

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting! It grew mold/mildew all up in it after 3 uses.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely grotesque, and I only used it 3 times! The amount of DISGUSTING mold/mildew that grew on the inside of it made me gag and immediately throw it in the trash. Buyer beware. There was so much mold/mildew all throughout that no hazmat team could tackle it.
customer_reviews.author: Joybkny

customer_reviews.title: Water tank leaked on arrival before I could use it.
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived - I cannot use it though, as the water tank leaks. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff D

customer_reviews.title: Burning Plastic...No Thank You
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for home facials. I set it up and when I turned it to face steamer, I immediately smelt burnt plastic. It was gross, like I was in some factory breathing this in. I turned it off, packed it up and sent it back and bought a BPA free face steamer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a while.
customer_reviews.text: Got this in September. Was excited to use it because who wants to boil water and stand over a pot when this can heat up in a minute. It’s December and I’ve used it maybe 4 or 5 times. Doesn’t work anymore. Doesn’t steam as much and only steams for 30 seconds, stops, steam again for 30 more seconds then does the same thing over again.
customer_reviews.author: Chyna J.

customer_reviews.title: Just take a hot shower
customer_reviews.text: This did not do anything more than what a hot shower would do for my pores.
customer_reviews.author: Mareena Miller

customer_reviews.title: Gets really, really hot
customer_reviews.text: Only used a couple of times because steam is uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Shellybean

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend as facial steamer
customer_reviews.text: I used this product mainly as a facial steamer, I used it successfully maybe 4 or 5 times... then the boiling water would occasionally bubble up and spray out of the steamer. I overlooked the boiling steam, then I noticed every time I cleaned out the steamer there was sandy debris constantly coming out where the water is stored. Still because I tried to make it work I consistently cleaned out the steamer. Then what I can not handle is the water bottle that carries the water broke for the second time all within 3-4 months. :) do not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Francisco

customer_reviews.title: Very strong plastic smell y. O
customer_reviews.text: Like the other reviewers who mentioned it, I noticed a very strong plastic smell from the steam this product produces. I wish it was made out of stainless steel inside this product where water is boiled to steam. As much as I love a good steaming session, I do not want to inhale toxic plastic chemicals throigh m
customer_reviews.author: I shop way too much here

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my wife less than a year ago. From the start it had issues - water would leak, or there would be minimal to no steam. This happened on and off for awhile. Now, it completely stop work, no matter what I tried. When it does work my wife loves it. Hope others will have better experience.
customer_reviews.author: Henry T La

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: Absolute trash. Barely any steam comes out and if it does, any wind whatsoever makes it useless.
customer_reviews.author: greg

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: Bought this two years ago and it died recently... no steam come out anymore...very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ming Li

customer_reviews.title: Hardly any steam!
customer_reviews.text: I'm an esthetician and this product sucks! It doesn't blow out any steam, very little steam comes out. Cheap and waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Product was good until the plastic ring on the water container broke. Now the water container can’t even be used. Money wasted. Bought this in July and only used 3 times. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: It’s an ok product
customer_reviews.text: It’s an ok product , it really doesn’t steam your face like it should. you have to place a towel over your head for it to properly work and even then it burns your face. What Also bothers me is that when you place a towel in the compartment it comes out smelling like plastic which I would definitely not place on my face.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a month
customer_reviews.text: Enjoyed using it for chronic dry eyes as well as facial products. Stopped working today after only having it about a month. Worked well when it did! Of course it stopped working ONE day after the refund window closed 😡
customer_reviews.author: SaraPo

customer_reviews.title: Purchased as new...came used...yuk
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this facial steamer as new. The box is wet, there is still water in the tank. Who would use something on their face that was used by someone else? I don't know how someone else used it, or what might now be growing in the steamer. No tools included.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Barrett

customer_reviews.title: It was good while it lasted..
customer_reviews.text: I had this product for over 6 months but it suddenly stopped working. It will still turn on but does not work on either setting. Sad. I wouldn’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Aviles

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend it at all
customer_reviews.text: The water container is very small and runs out very quickly. The worst part is it doesn’t turn off automatically, and becomes really hot. The humidifier makes little steam, not what you would expect to see. Overall bulky and heavy for no reason
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells like plastic
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this product. The overwhelming smell of plastic was intolerable. I was trying to have a relaxing spa experience, but instead, I got an instant headache. I'm not sure what type of plastic they're using, but they need to consider changing something. This can't be healthy. Another complaint I have is, despite the fact that the booklet warns you the steam will be very hot, I felt it was overheating. I had to keep my face very far from the steamer because it was scalding hot. This experience actually has me feeling like I'll probably just go back to the old way of leaning over a pot on the stove.
customer_reviews.author: Kylie

customer_reviews.title: A piece of crap!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this steamer not once but twice... After two weeks, I thought the first one just malfunctioned. Therefore, I exchanged it for another one. However, the 2nd steamer stopped working as well!!!
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: After a few uses that product does not produce any steam. I was quite disappointed for such a pricey steamer. I do not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: Little aggravated
customer_reviews.text: Love the hot steam..but just wish it was angled a little more or able to adjust it better ..cause I am short and it’s steams over my forehead so I have to put it lower ..
customer_reviews.author: Ting wang

customer_reviews.title: If all you need is a few minutes then buy
customer_reviews.text: The NanoSteamer is really pretty but it's not what I need. This product only give a few minutes of usage you have to keep putting water in it.
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product, Made in China. Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Very very little steam actually comes out, very weak product. Of course it comes with no instructions whatsoever...t
customer_reviews.author: jose zavala

customer_reviews.title: Good for a week
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working shortly after we bought it. I just never really thought on making a review. Caution it splashed steaming hot water on my fiancé’s face. Want my money back!
customer_reviews.author: Daniela25

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product based on the review. This is a very bad product. Quality of this is very poor. This is just a toy for kids except the blades. I am not recommending this product to anyone. This is just waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong burnt plastic smelling steam
customer_reviews.text: I feel like this is a biohazard. It smelled strongly like burnt plastic once the steam started coming out. I hope it'd go away after a while but it didn't, so I guess I'll stick to microwaving towels instead... I'll be sure to search for "plastic" before buying a steamer next time.
customer_reviews.author: Wei

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: Product looks nice, functioned well the first two times. Afterwards, it started making sounds and splashing water. Not safe if it's been used for facials.
customer_reviews.author: Ohitsujiza

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Does not even work anymore purchased less than a year ago and used 7 times at most. and can’t get in contact with seller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing that white piece in the middle that suppose to ...
customer_reviews.text: Missing that white piece in the middle that suppose to make the steam come out. I have to physically move the nano steamer around my face.
customer_reviews.author: Lolo

customer_reviews.title: Poor product
customer_reviews.text: I've only used my steamer 3 times and it's not keeping a continuous stream. It will steam for 2 seconds n stop. I believe I received a defaulted unit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.text: It does really produce a lot of stream from the machine. I ended up returning the item.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Woods

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: So when I first received my steamer, IT WAS AMAZING (lots of steams etcccc) but now it does steam the same..... I’ve only had it for a week...
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Crudup

customer_reviews.title: Easy and very convenient steam machine
customer_reviews.text: Easy and very convenient steam machine. I personally got it for my sinus issues but it's a great buy for cosmetic purposes as well. Quick n very hot steam erupts out of the opening in abt a minute or so and you're all set to steam away. Came with a very cool zippered pack of tools for cleaning black heads and all that gunk you want out!... Great buy. Update: Stopped working after a few months,the enite inner machine was all burnt up... disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: DeadManWalkn

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work; broke after two uses
customer_reviews.text: This steamer water tank cracked after two uses, and it doesn’t steam. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: nano steamer
customer_reviews.text: the lettering smeared off and you can't tell what setting you are on!
customer_reviews.author: patricia garcia

customer_reviews.title: Not a good buy
customer_reviews.text: Towel warmer heats up very hot until it dryes the towel out. Steamer dosent come out as expect slow puffs of smoke one at a time
customer_reviews.author: Rossann

customer_reviews.title: Stop working
customer_reviews.text: Less then a month it’s stop working and plastic water bottle melt
customer_reviews.author: Antionette

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 5 uses
customer_reviews.text: Initially I really liked this steamer. After several uses the cap of water bottle that fills the steamer split so now it is unusable. 😞
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken on first usage
customer_reviews.text: Just got it today. I fill the water container amd immediately saw water dripping from the cracks. Still tried it amd thought it took too long to heat up. Almost waites 5 mins just too see it start coming out with steam. The steam does not consistently jet out. Will return due to broken water container.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I used it twice before it stopped working. Nothing comes out! I’m really pissed, I thought this was going to be a quality product. Oh well :/
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Klass

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my Facial routine
customer_reviews.text: Love this steamer. Bought this to replace my old temperamental facial steamer. This one is so easy to set up and use. I have only used the facial steamer part. It is just perfect to sit on my counter next to the sink. I turn it on to heat up while I wash my face, then I can just stand there at the sink getting my face steamed and opening up my pores to clean out all the old oil and dirt. It is so easy, that it is now a daily part of my routine rather than just once a week. My face looks so much clearer, my pores are really less noticeable due to how clean they are.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Mostad

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't good for me
customer_reviews.text: I recieved a used one because there was water in it and it was still wet for some reason like someone used it and put it back in there and delivered it to me. The tools weren't in the bag either.
customer_reviews.author: Mcrey

customer_reviews.title: Box was previously opened and used
customer_reviews.text: The steamer works, towel function is weak and tools are cheaply made and packaged. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Kmiec

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I tired to use it and it wouldn't work, then it squirted out steaming hot water onto me.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi

customer_reviews.title: Stops working after few uses
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for a year but I’ve only used it a handful of times. I started it up this morning and it doesn’t work! If I unlock it, open it up and put my hand in it I can feel warmth coming from it but no actual steam is being produced. Waste of money. I should have just bought a cheap humidifier from the drugstore.
customer_reviews.author: Laura K

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Steam was more of a projectile rather than a full face .
customer_reviews.author: Akeem jones

customer_reviews.title: Not worth .. dangerous.. water leaking
customer_reviews.text: I used it couple of time n now water is leaking from bottom.. don’t suggest as it can b dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: Sandhya P.

customer_reviews.title: broke after one month of use
customer_reviews.text: it was good for about 4 weeks then stopped steaming and now is not return eligible
customer_reviews.author: Cindy S.

customer_reviews.title: Face steamer
customer_reviews.text: It was not new when delivered now it’s not working anymore
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Chan

customer_reviews.title: I have been using this since 2016
customer_reviews.text: I've bought this since 2016, used it twice per week and it still works. But 1 year ago I started to see clear/brownish gungy residues falling out after I dump my remaining water out from the machine (not the water holder but the base itself). It was somewhat alarming but I continued to use it since it still steams great. Until recently, it looks like there were more and more residues!!!! EWWW, and it smells like plastic too. I'm too scared it might affect my health since I'm breathing that in when I'm using it. Does anyone have this problem too?
customer_reviews.author: Quan Tu

customer_reviews.title: Can’t use last long
customer_reviews.text: This steamer has broken after using for 3 times. When I turn it on, the hot steam run out with the hot water too. It’s so hot. I don’t know what’s wrong?
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Tran

customer_reviews.title: Good steamer but bad parts
customer_reviews.text: It was great!! But the cap on the water reservoir came apart and now I can’t use it after less than a year
customer_reviews.author: J T

customer_reviews.title: start broken after half year
customer_reviews.text: After half year using it, the steam start to be weak and keep turn off by itself! Does not worth money at all. I don’t know why there are so many good reviews about this.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Hua

customer_reviews.title: Hot water
customer_reviews.text: Hot water splashes all over my face when using the facial steamer feature.
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: I had it for a week and the knob has already broken off.. it now no longer works
customer_reviews.author: cw

customer_reviews.title: Cap of the water reservoir cracked the 2nd time I ...
customer_reviews.text: Cap of the water reservoir cracked the 2nd time I used I used the steamer. Water leaked and made a mess.
customer_reviews.author: nina

customer_reviews.title: Dirty/used product
customer_reviews.text: The steamer that I got was used. It had marks inside the steamer as well as the packet containing the extra items.
customer_reviews.author: Sopan Acharya

product_meta.title: NanoSteamer Large 3-in-1 Nano Ionic Facial Steamer with Precise Temp Control - 30 Min Steam Time - Humidifier - Unclogs Pores - Blackheads - Spa Quality - Bonus 5 Piece Stainless Steel Skin Kit
feature_bullets: NANO-IONIC FACIAL STEAMER & HUMIDIFIER - The Pure Daily Care Nano Steamer is a new type of steamer that generates nano-ionic steam. NanoSteamer does this by combining a conventional heating element with a new ultra sonic vaporizer to produce nano steam with negatively charged ionic particles. Nano steam combined with ionic water particles are up to 10x more effective in penetrating skin.

PROFESSIONAL 5 PIECE SKIN KIT INCLUDED - A Bonus 5 piece stainless steel blackhead and blemish extractor kit is included with every Nanosteamer. This kit includes 5 precise instruments that compliment your Nanosteamer perfectly. Followup your steaming session by using this kit to remove blackheads and blemishes effortlessly for perfect skin after every use.
MULTIFUNCTIONAL - 3-in-1 device can also be set to humidify a room and has an extra chamber to warm towels for ultimate refreshment
LONGER RUNNING TIME - A larger 200ml water tank allows for 30 minutes of working time with a completely silent operation
WHATS IN THE BOX – 1 NanoSteamer Facial Steamer, 5-piece stainless steel skin kit with storage pouch, Power cable, Instruction and support contact manual
